apiDescription: A struct to help with fmt::Debug implementations.
This is useful when you wish to output a formatted list of items as a part of your Debug::fmt implementation.
This can be constructed by the Formatter::debug_list method.

methods.name: pub fn entry(&mut self, entry: &Debug) -> &mut DebugList<'a, 'b>

description: Adds a new entry to the list output.

methods.name: pub fn entries<D, I>(&mut self, entries: I) -> &mut DebugList<'a, 'b> where D: Debug, I: IntoIterator<Item = D>

description: Adds the contents of an iterator of entries to the list output.

methods.name: pub fn finish(&mut self) -> Result<(), Error>

description: Finishes output and returns any error encountered.
